description:
Welcome to Social Media Strategies for the DIY Musician, a detailed guide on how to grow your fan base, sell more music, & maximize your exposure through Social Media.

This course is for Artists, Bands, Singers, Musicians, Songwriters, Producers, & DJs of any Genre who are seeking to authentically grow their fan base and visibility online through social networks; it is NOT intended for musicians who aren't willing to put any effort or who don't have the patience to watch the results grow. This is not an overnight to stardom guide, but if you are willing to put in the work day after day, you will see your visibility flourish!


Included in this course are step by step instructions on how to create a social media page for 4 major platform and downloadable guides to help direct you through making the post of your postings.
title: Social Media Strategies for DIY Musicians
